name: FRigUnit_PointSimulation
doc:
Performs point based simulation
Note: Disabled for now.

Links: The links to connect the points with
SimulatedStepsPerSecond: The frame rate of the simulation
IntegratorType: The type of integrator to use
VerletBlend: The amount of blending to apply per second ( only for verlet integrations )
BoneTargets: The bones to map to the simulated points.
bLimitLocalPosition:
If set to true bones are placed within the original distance of
the previous local transform. This can be used to avoid stretch.
bPropagateToChildren:
If set to true all of the global transforms of the children
of this bone will be recalculated based on their local transforms.
Note: This is computationally more expensive than turning it off.
PrimaryAimAxis: The primary axis to use for the aim
SecondaryAimAxis: The secondary axis to use for the aim
DebugSettings: Debug draw settings for this simulation
Bezier: If the simulation has at least four points they will be stored in here.
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable nodes together
